channel.title: Command to pi from delta?

item.title: Command to pi from delta?
item.dc:creator: @scenemo scenemo
item.description:
@scenemo wrote:

can anybody help change this delta command to pi? i tried but keep gettin errors

if (command.startsWith(“owned”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“emokid”))
{
stillgfx(453, absY+3, absX+1);
stillgfx(453, absY-3, absX-1);
attackPlayersWithin(444, 10, 30);
attackPlayersWithin(444, 70, 5);
}

Read full topic
